metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39316 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple integer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the LXT2num_dict_entries functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted.lxt2 file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need toopen a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerabilityconcerns the integer overflow when allocating the `string_pointers` array.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
